title: SUPER  lAGG after Up patch 5.11
body:
Hi Riot 
After i up patch 5.11 every time i play it so lagg .
Please help me fix it 
tomorrow it my holiday i want to enjoy wit LOL 
thank you {{champion:9}}

replies.body:
What sort of lag are you speaking off? Is it a high ping, or a low frame-rate?

Also, what OS are you using, and which ISP are you with?

Thank you for REPLAY my problem 

Is it a high ping all games .it's happen every 2/3 min 
 
OS its mean windows 8 

sorry I dont understand ISP

sorry my english not good I'm from Thailand

>What kind of internet connection do you have (Cable / ADSL)?
-ADSL iiNET 

This is what ISP usually refers too. It stands for "Internet Service Provider", and encompasses the company which provides you with an internet connection.

Have you tried connecting your laptop to your router with a wire instead of using WiFi?

AFTER I CONNECT the cable with router are ok 
but its happen when  i used the wifi 
what can i do for fixed

That could mean that there's a problem with your wireless connection. Among some of the things you can try:

* Move closer to the router.
* Disable all non-crucial devices that could be causing interference (microwave ovens, television sets, other computers, etc.)
* Purchase a range-extender for your router.
* Use another receiver on your computer.
* Repair your router/purchase a better one.

Otherwise, you should stick to using your wired connection.

Dear HORSE OF FORCE (OCE)
Thank you for you help i will do it 
if still cant fix i will call you again 
 
thank you so much

Where (what city) are you playing from?
- I playing from Adelaide 

What is your normal ping to League?
-35 to 60 

What kind of internet connection do you have (Cable / ADSL)?
-ADSL  iiNET 

Do you connect your computer to the internet via a cable or via Wifi?
-WIFI Laptop
